text: what is my perfect crime I break into
Tiffany's in midnight do I go for the
vault no I go for the chandelier it's
priceless as I'm taking it down a woman
catches me she tells me to stop it's her
father's business
she's Tiffany I say no we make love all
night in the morning the cops come and I
escaped in one of their uniforms I tell
her to meet me in Mexico but I go to
Canada I don't trust her besides I like
the cold thirty years later I get a
postcard I have a son and he's the Chief
of Police this is where the story gets
interesting
I tell Tiffany to meet me in Paris by
the Trocadero she's been waiting for me
all these years she's never taken
another lover I don't care I don't show
up I go to Berlin that's where I stashed
the chandelier
[Music]
